description: Training dataset for complex and multi-action commands

data.text: open spotify play focus music and block notifications for 2 hours
data.label: focus_mode

data.text: morning routine open chrome outlook teams and spotify
data.label: morning_routine

data.text: evening routine close work apps open netflix and spotify
data.label: evening_routine

data.text: workout time close all apps open spotify and set timer for 45 minutes
data.label: workout_mode

data.text: study mode open notepad chrome for research and block social media
data.label: study_mode

data.text: meeting preparation open teams outlook and set reminder 5 minutes before

data.text: presentation setup open powerpoint chrome for references and start timer
data.label: presentation_setup

data.text: research session open chrome vscode and create project folder
data.label: research_session

data.text: coding time open vs code terminal spotify and set pomodoro timer
data.label: coding_session

data.text: lunch break close work apps open youtube and set 1 hour timer
data.label: lunch_break

data.text: end of day close all applications and set reminder for tomorrow's tasks
